channel.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
channel.description:
I just finished dl and installing BMS and right after i click finish on the installer, steam pops up with a "you have to install Source SDK Base or watever"
I missclicked decline..... i cant find a autoplay/run anywhere or somehow to make it pop up again...
anyone kno how i can fix this problem? =D

item.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
item.dc:creator: strangeDrk
item.description:
Oh okay thanks for the help.

Read full topic
item.source: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it

item.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
You have not installed Source SDK 2007
locate ALL GAMES and a small tick on the library, just above your games list, and click on the arrow, then change it to TOOLS locate Source SDK 2007 and download it, once that has done (only takes 10minutes) it should launch.

Read full topic
item.source: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it

item.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
item.dc:creator: Alx
item.description:
Exactly how are you trying to launch the game?

Do you have Source SDK Base 2007 downloaded on Steam? If not, go to Tools in Steam and download it for free.

Read full topic
item.source: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it

item.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
item.dc:creator: strangeDrk
item.description:
Hello, I downloaded the game and installed it, But when I open steam to try and launch the game it will not start… So I’m thinking uh is steam bugged and try to run another game like hl2 and it works fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Source SDK Base 2007: all about it
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
^ Pretty the post above. Go in the tool section of the library on Steam and download manually the Source SDK base 2007.
